title: Incorporate Customer_Analyzer fit tier + segment into issue priority weighting

sections.text: Update the Issue_Tracker prioritization pipeline to apply weighting based on Customer_Analyzer-provided fit_tier and segment_id for impacted accounts (no new ICP/segment logic). Define a deterministic mapping (config-driven) from fit_tier/segment to multiplier(s) and ensure issues with mixed/missing account metadata degrade gracefully to current scoring. Persist the computed segment/fit-weighted components on the issue/theme score breakdown for auditability and downstream debugging.
